column3: “where to begin? my father told me growing up in the 60's PR was the best grass you could get. flash forward to today and i came across it at a shop, and had to try what my father called the best. as a 10 year smoker of modern strains, i didnt expect the high that came. stoney, talkative, relaxing, i would say this is what weed is about, your cartoony like high. ill say this, my understanding of the 1960's has drastic...”

“I try other strains but have to say that this is the one that gives me options.  Whether it is the THC content or cannabinoid levels, I don't know those details about P-Red, but this is the one I go back to for daily use, morning, noon and night.  I can function.  There is not too much Sativa impact so I can do what I have to do every day.  There is not enough Indica to hold me down, although if I choose to laze out ...”

“Purchased from World of Weed
Flower: nice smaller sized buds and not as loose as a typical sativa. 
Smell: definitely sweet with a little bit of citrus. Has that old school earthy bud smell. 
Crumble: kinda dry batch so it ground poorly. I was left with a lot of keif looking stuff. 
Burn: because it was dry, it burned faster and harsher than usual. 
Taste: pretty much mirrored the smell, a little skunky. 
High: I'm n...”
“Panama Red is one of the best weed strains I've ever smoked. Great for people with anxiety and I'm the type to say any weed isn't good for anxiety.”

“I smoked half a joint of pure Panama Red yesterday. I was amazed how long the effect of this classic strain lasted on me. The taste when smoking it isn't great, tastes very woody/earthy, but the high you get from this specific strain is unique in my opinion. I would highly reccomend this strain to anyone.”
“Nice stuff from Green Bluff Greenhouse near Spokane. 15.75% THC-THCA.  0.44% CBD.  Grassy, tropical aroma and taste through the vape. Licorice/black tea taste coats mouth on exhale. Nice up" high
column4: but more groovy than racy. Had a few draws.  Didn't feel much effect
column6: I had a few more.  Maybe 8 or 9 total.  Got vape hot enough to melt THCV.  Then things picked up a bit.  Started having troub...”"

column3: “I like strains that get me the results without slowing me down or having me feel" high (okay
column4: there are times and places for strains that make me "feel" high
column5: but not on my daily smoke). I don't like being cloudy. So I really like this strain. It gave me the energy
column6: relieved me of the omnipresent anxiety for a bit
column7: and I didn't get fogged or twitchy.”"

column3: “An absolute legend, and as nostalgic as strains come. I'd heard numerous stories throughout the years from the old school heads about the legendary Panama Red. They reminisce about how buds don't come as smooth and groovy as The Red. I've tried an unfathomable number of strains and had never come across this elusive lady. Until one day... I was helping a grower buddy of mine do some trim sessions. So one night he and...”

“i've seen a few different seed companies that offer panama red strain and wanted to grow it this summer... one of the reputable local dispensaries got a batch in and i bought an 1/8 oz last week..... the kind they had was very well grown and fresh (always a plus because a lot of dispensaries have dry buds that been sittin around for 8 months not sayin thats bad i just prefer fresh buds) anyways... very unique smell, ...”
“My favorite so far. Helps with nerve pain, my mood, and helps with stress while not making me hungry”
“Fucking amazing! Dig the wood taste! got me and my friend high as fuck”

“It's not often that I go out of my way to pursue a Sativa, but when I heard this was in town, it was impossible to resist. Having only heard stories and seen a few pictures of this legendary strain, I of course had my expectations set quite high, if you'll pardon the pun. I must say, I was not disappointed. Sweet, sugarcane inhale, with a rich earthy exhale, the euphoria bit my head and heart in a way I don't really ...”

“Panama Red- now thats a blast from the past: circa 1972 imagine a group of high school kids, one of them gets his hands on some Panama Red and shares. Extremely stimulating, like being strapped to a saturn V rocket. extreme continued  acceleration, almost unbearable then it smooths out, reaches a peak then a smooth parachute aided slash down, nice, very nice just like I remember it being. For the uninitiated the extr...”
“I love growing this strain. Received real Panama Red seeds and would like too post real pictures of the strain.”

“THIS STRAIN IS SATIVALICIOUS💨💨😍. I THINK IM JUST LIKING IT MORE AND MORE EACH TIME I GET SOME. MY PAIN GETS WIPED OFF FROM MY BACK AND LEGS EVEN MY HUBBY SEE'S THE DIFFERENCE. THE PRICE IS GREAT AND IF IM HAPPY I HOPE OTHERS ARE TOO😆😋 HOPE IT HELPS ON ALL YOUR DISABILITIES AND MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE A HERO. ENJOY SATIVALICIOUS PANAMA RED.
1 GRAM
$7.11
MY FAVRITE LOCATON @
CANNA CARE INC.
SACRAMENTO CA
ON HARRIS AVE....”

“Super smooth in both smoking flavor and the ensuing high. Definitely a weed version of a craft beer. You lose some punch in the process, but gain plenty of quality and a more natural high that newer, younger strains growers have left behind in the pursuit more, better, faster, higher, bigger.”

“It is definitely one of my favorites! 😍 I love the high it gave me and the fact that it makes me giggly and want to do something is awesome. It doesn't make me think about my depression or anxiety and that's what I love most! 
I definitely slept really well when I did smoke it!”

“The mellowness efffect of smoking this strain is taken to a whole new level.  I smoked some 27%THC Panama Red and the high was a super intense melowness that really helped my anxiety.  The Sativa would not let me sit still.  I would like to have some Panama Red that has been harvested with clear trich.s and some with amber trich.s.  Clear for am, amber for pm and more CBD's in amber trichomes.”

“I lived in the Canal Zone '71 to '73. Red was a very sticky rust colored strain that would give you trouble staying awake beyond 10 minutes if you smoked too much. It was generally harvested towards the end of the dry season around march, lots of amber. And no it is not from Colombia, it was grown mostly in the Perlas Islands off the coast of Panama. Dove for STRI (Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute) in that are...”
“some day :)”

“Mellow taste and complex smoke. I used a Flo pen topper uncut 850mg that didn't give me the ability to get real hands on with this strain however the method by which I enjoyed it was supreme. The cartridge wasnt a huge concern but it did allow me to travel with this strain easily and that's a great way to enjoy anything! Some of the pros include: the sweet initial taste as well as the soft energetic feeling I got fro...”

“One of my favorites. Got a few times from OMG in Rainier. Fire flower and oil.  A bit of insomnia after smoking all day. Very functional and energetic, while still offering a pretty strong dose of euphoria. Definitely hallucinogenic at times, for me, during periods of heavy use.”
“This is my go to get up and go" strain.

column1: I'm more of an indica kind of gal due to fibromyalgia and PTSD. The sativas I've had prior to this one always caused me to become anxious and on edge. I still try them when given the chance though
This was one of those I never knew ones. It's amazing. It didn't cause me to become anxious in any way. I swear I talked for like 3 hours straight. I have...”"

column3: “I've tried several strains trying to get high. This hit it and what a high it is! chill, talk, relax... AWESOME.”
“This is my go to get up and go" strain.

column1: I'm more of an indica kind of gal due to fibromyalgia and PTSD. The sativas I've had prior to this one always caused me to become anxious and on edge. I still try them when given the chance though
This was one of those I never knew ones. It's amazing. It didn't cause me to become anxious in any way. I swear I talked for like 3 hours straight. I have...”"

column3: “I've tried several strains trying to get high. This hit it and what a high it is! chill, talk, relax... AWESOME.”

“Amazing sativa effect. Uplifting, energetic euphoria. Awesome day strain. Felt extremely positive and motivated. Very functional. Could be a great strain for depression. Long lasting with a long, smooth comedown. This one was from SMMA, and I'm really hoping they get it again.”

“I lived in the Canal Zone '71 to '73. Red was a very sticky rust colored strain that would give you trouble staying awake beyond 10 minutes if you smoked too much. It was generally harvested towards the end of the dry season around march, lots of amber. And no it is not from Colombia, it was grown mostly in the Perlas Islands off the coast of Panama. Dove for STRI (Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute) in that are...”

“Panama Red is some nice daytime weed. I've bought this strain a few times from Belltown PDA. I feel really creative and goofy when I smoke it. I talk a lot and get really inspired to do things, but I get kinda lazy too. The high lasts usually a couple of hours for me but it's mellow. At no point have I ever been smoking Pam and been like oh my god
column5: but I definitely like this strain. The only th...”"

column3: “The mellowness efffect of smoking this strain is taken to a whole new level.  I smoked some 27%THC Panama Red and the high was a super intense melowness that really helped my anxiety. Clear for am, amber for pm and more CBD's in amber trichomes.”

“Panama Red is a euphoric experience which will leave you anywhere between laughing hysterically at your film of choice and contemplating life from the most metaphysical plane you've ever been on. Having been a smoker for some years, this is hands down one of my favourite sativas so far. Whereas some can (often pleasingly) come on with a full-hitting head-dizzying high, Panama Red leaves plenty of space for your own p...”
“One of the best strain around, may not be suitable to sleep as it's very uplifting, aroma is delicious, do a hybrid with something lemony and keep the spicy you get the Strain of the years.”

“Great Strain to chill out with after a busy day, relaxing,but not too overpowering,that it's not enjoyable. 
grew some this past summer. Takes patience. 
definitely worth the wait, if you can get your hands on some try it. 😁”

“Wow .. this is a diggin in the crates type of strain .. been tokin for decades and never had it.  Spicy aftertaste on exhale, pretty good sativa has you frantic at times with energy but overall just happy vibes and I’ll shit ...”
“THIS STRAIN REALLY HELPED ME RELAX AND FOR MY PAIN. MORE THAN OTHER DAYS I WAS ACTIVE. I THINK IM GOING TO KEEP THIS ONE ON ME😉 ITS WORTH WHAT U SPEND...”
“It's everything they say. Very rare find in my neck of the woods of Northern Michigan.”
“Cont--Has an aroma, taste and smooth smoking qualities  like those of the super silver haze strain”

“Beautiful looking bud, the taste was just as great. First actual Strain of bud I ever bought. The taste was sweet but mild. With a nice intake. The high for me came through quick, and made me feel lite. It was euphoric, at a quick but steady speed, as it made me feel happy, talkative person with less anxiety. For pain purpose, it helped ease off my nerve pain nicely, with comfort. Without notice. I was able to functi...”
“Panama Red deflowered me and will be fondly remembered as my first bag. Lovely red hairs with a smooth honey taste and strong steady buzz. Good social medicine soarks conversation”

“Picked this one up from Shift NM in Santa Fe NM. First thing. My pops was a old school hippie his teens and 20s where in the 60s and 70s. This and Thai sticks are what he would tell me he would burn back then. When I first Smelled it I was greeted with a delightful citrus sent with a piney undertone to it. With bright green buds and a tricome  coating that can be described as majestic. Took the flower home and loaded...”

“Beautiful looking bud, the taste was just as great. First actual Strain of bud I ever bought. The taste was sweet but mild. With a nice intake. The high for me came through quick, and made me feel lite. It was euphoric, at a quick but steady speed, as it made me feel happy, talkative person with less anxiety. For pain purpose, it helped ease off my nerve pain nicely, with comfort. Without notice. I was able to functi...”
“It's everything they say. Very rare find in my neck of the woods of Northern Michigan.”

“I smoked Panama Red yesterday. I think I was high for at least 2 hours straight. This strain is without a doubt a must try for every stoner. It has such a strong sweet smell, that every time I open the jar where I Store it my entire room smells like soap for a Long time.”

“Vaped finely-ground in my MFLB. Very odd flavor, bitter and funky like old linseed oil.  As others have mentioned, it has a very 80s feel to it.  My unfounded theory is this has a lot to do with the ratio of THC to CBD and other volatile compounds.  Pronounced time dilation, which combined with the brightness probably accounts for this strains reputation as a get shit done" variety.  Good for deep cleaning the kitch...”"

“This is a strain that had a reputation back in the 70's, that it was kick ass weed. Wow!!!  I took a couple of puffs and thought, aww OK where's the hit?  A couple of minutes passed and I got this feel of total contentment and relaxation. This strain is so smooth. My entire head and body feels smooth and with have a happy cerebral high. Sitting here smiling and definitely relaxed. This strain has beautiful small buds...”

“All sativa enthusiasts will quickly adopt Panama Red as one of their favourite strains ever. Incredible potency (possibly the strongest weed I've ever smoked, and I have smoked a lot of weed).
Get ready to LAUGH”
“Cont--Has an aroma, taste and smooth smoking qualities  like those of the super silver haze strain”

“I smoked Panama Red yesterday. I think I was high for at least 2 hours straight. This strain is without a doubt a must try for every stoner. It has such a strong sweet smell, that every time I open the jar where I Store it my entire room smells like soap for a Long time.”

Get ready to LAUGH”
“really good sativa strain, really feeling happy and energetic. Hits right in the head and it make awesome thc”

“I bought some Panama Red, 1-2 toke weed for a minor buzz. More is fun, but not necessary all of the time: you might need to accomplish something that might require functioning! The buds of Panama Red are coated with flavor crystals" encrusted w/ orange hairs
column4: leaves are bright lime green. All products here ( I examined several kinds) are fresh and aromatic. Very pretty head: rushing at 4-5 hits. You know

column3: “phanomanail strain from old if done right the stories become true and who says there's not any of it around anymore well I say yes there is mine was stellar testing out at a 23.61% thc. and hitting several of the cbds if anyone's looking ta be able try this classic landrace stativa head down ta Eugene OG on Franklin Blvd Eugene OR”
“Fun energetic high, no couch-lock stoney stuff here. I have a hard time with paranoia and anxiety when smoking and this gave me no problems.”
“Strong enough strain but every time I have smoked it I've gotten fairly nauseous or sick!”

“A classic strain and classic stoned feeling uplifted and happy no crazy racing thoughts I have deemed this strain to be my top favorites among them all. The appetite is just amazing on this strain. Before I had a child plate of food or half a sandwich I suffer from extreme anorexia
column4: due to my esophagus being to small and have strictures
column5: but I recently got stretched but still have phobias and sometimes is still diff...”"

column3: “Had the luck of trying out this strain. Best damn Sativa strain personally of mine, one on my list of favorite 5. Haven’t been able to find it in SFV, Ca. Definitely Uplifting, made me feel Groovy and Funky, pretty damn great!! Must try but when you are feeling to be UP!! Have fun”

“This is overall a fantastic strain with a high unlike I have felt before. Like it started off with a steady head high building up then my whole body became slumped for a short time and then it all just went straight to my head and i felt myself take off into the clouds riding one off into the sunset never to be seen again.”
“An incredible classic Cannabis strain. Speedy intense and euphoric effects make this a great strain for mornings.”

“This is a gorgeous bud and calms you down about an hour after smoking it. At first you will begin to feel very energetic and uplifted but once the effects start kicking in hard, this shit will knock you the fuck out!”

“Flowery, nutty, pungent vaped at 185 Celsius. Describe this very cerebral very drastic change is that it makes things brighter shinier and it will make you happy euphoric and ecstatic. I have a very high tolerance user and I would say Panama lasts for about three hours. I can see why they call it panama red it smells of Cherry and tea leaves and the hairs around it form and small clumps around the greeny leafy produc...”
“I tried this strain while on a quest to try legendary strains" from the Vietnam Era and beyond. What I got was a very neutral tasting

column1: Be prepared for a trip! But if you're in a cozy place
column2: you'll be okay. It started making me chatty
column3: and then I was happy and gone. This strain made me feel very critical of my own life. My mind was scattered
column4: but not in a scary way. I thought back to a ra...”"

column3: “they let me so fucking happy, such a great strain!”
“Took a dab of shatter, instant hit. Dreamy state, unfocused for a bit. Constant buzzzzzz.”

“(Grower Grade- A) Live Resin

This review is for Panama Punch (Hawaiian Punch X Panama Red)
Live Resin is where it's at, the extremely high THC levels and unbelievable fresh flavor is to die for. I picked up a gram of Panama Punch, took the smallest dab and was blown away. I just really can't get over the flavor! Grab some PP if you can find it, flower or concentrate.”

“Where to start fellas? I was sitting in the library bored by books, I studied all day long. I wanted to offer a little gift for myself, so I called my doctor. Which veggie? he asks. A good sativa strain, no hybrid shit. About an hour later, he shows up in his all black trashy and smelly car. He hands me the bag without the rotted salemanship talk. I looked at him, he nodds his head a few time and said It's good kho
“helps with anxiety.”

“A classic strain and classic stoned feeling uplifted and happy no crazy racing thoughts I have deemed this strain to be my top favorites among them all. The appetite is just amazing on this strain. Before I had a child plate of food or half a sandwich I suffer from extreme anorexia
column4: due to my esophagus being to small and have strictures
column5: but I recently got stretched but still have phobias and sometimes is still diff...”"

column3: “I usually steer away from the sativas. I pick up some sugar wax made from this strain. It was red! It was smooth hitting with a hint of spicy finish. It relaxed me like an indica. Very smooth. Killed my hip pain. Overall, good stuff. The flowers my wife bought of the same was very tasty. We had to try what you don't see often. Glad I did. Do it!”

“I love this strain because of how it makes me feel. I’ve never had anything like this so it’s amazing. I like how it starts off mellow and then leaves me calm & relaxed, I’d recommend it to anyone .”
“Yes”

“I've never had this before. It was on the list at the shop and i remembered what De niro said..oh i bet you do Panama Red"..so i mentioned that to my buddy and we bought it based off that line..Thank You' Meet The Parents'!!! Thee best sativa i have ever had..Right now im watching the Mariner game and i feel like im at Safeco! Intense high
column4: the depression is gone. If you love a psychedelic type high this buds for yo...”"

column3: “My local dispensary had some  panama red which I had never herd of so I decided to go ahead and by an 8th just to see what it was like and it has proved to be my new favorite smoke. I highly recommend to anyone looking to try a new strain. Will definitely smoke again”
“My favorite strain”
“alsome pure sativa base.”
“Clear, warm, relaxing high with an uplifting feeling. Easy to think and jogs your mind; helps with communication.”
“I'm 56 years old and I've just rediscovered an old friend. I feel like I just did a wake and bake before first period! A new/old personal favorite...”

“I asked to give me a different strain, since I was getting used to the Purple, and boy did they ever.  Thanks Swell for giving me RedX. It gave me a sense of being aware.  I also felt like my muscles were relaxing and I could actually get things done for a couple of hours.
I smoke out of a bong and the flavor of the weed lasts throughout the bowl.  Awesome taste too.  Almost a Tangerine flavor.”
“great strain”

“I was looking forward to trying this strain. I gave it a four stars because I don't like the pressure in the head side-effect. Also, I was hoping it would have creative effects. I feel too heavy to create, but my focus is alright.”
“clean natural mood boost, gives munchies later on the drop.  not overwhelming, great for being out and about”
“My favorite. Got a half of flower from OMG in Rainier. FIRE. Their PR honey oil is sweet and fruity, and a wonderful high as well. Highly recommended, if it is grown properly.”
“New favorite. Perfect amount of feeling in spirits and comfort without making you dizzy.”
“My fav so far”
“Most amazing high ever but I once did smoke with a couple others and they threw up? Everyone thought it was k2 but I got it from my dispensary. Cops came out and everything. I felt fine though.”

“This is a gorgeous bud and calms you down about an hour after smoking it. At first you will begin to feel very energetic and uplifted but once the effects start kicking in hard, this shit will knock you the fuck out!”
“An incredible classic Cannabis strain. Speedy intense and euphoric effects make this a great strain for mornings.”

“This is overall a fantastic strain with a high unlike I have felt before. Like it started off with a steady head high building up then my whole body became slumped for a short time and then it all just went straight to my head and i felt myself take off into the clouds riding one off into the sunset never to be seen again.”

“Fun energetic high, no couch-lock stoney stuff here. I have a hard time with paranoia and anxiety when smoking and this gave me no problems.”

“phanomanail strain from old if done right the stories become true and who says there's not any of it around anymore well I say yes there is mine was stellar testing out at a 23.61% thc. and hitting several of the cbds if anyone's looking ta be able try this classic landrace stativa head down ta Eugene OG on Franklin Blvd Eugene OR”
“I like it. Not much of a fan of the taste. The strain isn't super dank but it's dank enough and hits you fast. It is indeed sativa dominant but has some indica effects.”

“Panama Red is a fun old-school strain that's definitely worth smoking a few times. A really nice mellow high that takes care of my anxiety and still leaves me clearheaded. Not a very strong smoke, but still worth it.”
“I've had some better strains but for what it's worth, the strain is a good head high but lacks for pain relief”
“Love love love! Great mellow high!”

“i bought an 1/8th of this and took it home and rolled a fatty.the 1/8th was one big Christmas tree bud,green w/ lots of red in it.kinda earthy,spicy taste to it and was fairly potent but not what i was expecting the problem was it was a really crispy,dry,hot burning bud,couple of twists int the grinder and it was gone so i know that was the main problem in the potency.i`m 65 yrs. old and have been smoking f/ 50 years...”
“Great strain that can keep you awake and in a positive mood also makes you hungry 😋🍫🍕”
“Love love love! Great mellow high!”
“Great Smoke. Unique flower that has a sweet earthy smell. Dense buds that give a mellow high that leave you creative and talkative. Ideal for social situations.”
“Just blew some. Feels like an off balance, slow motion heady high.  The smell reminded me of the 90's lol”
“Alert and active. Little pain relief. Mixed half and half with Blue Moonshine and treats pain level 6-7 with little drowsiness.”
“Nice”
“Totally agree with this high bordering on psychedelic!!”
“wicked wonderful old school , dont let her breed and she will blow you away .”

“I purchased this sativa strain due to my hx with it, it was the  first I'd ever had. I was thrown back Los Angeles 1970. The head was lofty, at times sluggish,happy and hungry, before I realized my pain was gone and Tom Waite & I were cruising PCH heading for Huntington Beach Resort for a swim and camp fire. ..thank you for saving this strain,it won't let you down.”
“Good”
“.... it was like stepping back in time”
“So uplifting, but you're gonna be sleepy as shit.”
“All day relief”
“Very good sativa. Can smoke it all day and not get burnt out. Keeps me going.”
“yo! the strain came back ! no mo seeds”
“really good strain for people who want an energetic high that stems from your mind. sativa lovers would more than likely make this a go to strain.”

“Very energetic buzz with an extreme euphoric feeling. One of the few highs that has made me want to work out or accomplish tasks. Can still create a great couch lock feeling if you focus on relaxing. Body aches and pains really don't stand a chance against trainwreck. The indica undertones really pull this strain together and is a solid choice for avid partakers.”

“One of my favorites when grown right. Got my last batch at OMG in Ranier, and it was delicious. 
This is a very functional Sativa for me, still very euphoric, a bit of insomnia, hallucinogenic during high usage.”

“all you would except from a sativa !
no body high at all !
very energizing, talkative and go about your business strain.
I medicate with this strain when I know I'll have to socialize,  drive, work or take care of business. 
Totally light”
“This is my favorite strain, only found it once, so if you have the opportunity to try it dont pass it up!!!! Ack!!”

“I live in Panama and by the end of 1998 I try natural, red long thin leaf strains from the natives in San Miguel island, it was bad preserved(wrapped on news paper), but the taste and action were perfect. It taste like woody with cajan pea or pigeon pea flavor(maybe the fertilizer or other reason) and the action was accurate and satisfying with creative ideas, quality smile and kind of horny feelings.”

“Good for focus and daytime operation. Cerebral, happy high. Felt energetic and focused; helped me study for a long time. Increased music-listening pleasure and I became more social and talkative. My appetite increased quite a bit (be mindful of what you eat and quantity when smoking this strain).  The high lasted a couple hours for me and the come-down was mildly sedative, so after finishing my work, I didn't have a ...”
“Amazingly smooth high. Very energetic, happy and creative.”
“I Just Smoked Some Today Ha It Is Bomb.Com I Guess Im One Of The Few Lucky Ones To Smoke This❗❕❗❕💯😎”
“favorite strain for depression and curing an idle mind”
“Very smooth to smoke. If you don't like coughing then this is the one!”

“It is definitely the reddest strain I've ever come across. I had the pleasure of consuming about an oz of this and was quite happy with its mellow high. It was rare that I really liked this sativa which is the lowest liking to me out of the  3 categories. indica and hybrids are more to my liking.”
“LOVE! Awesome for pain and insomnia.”
“Dusty smell and rich earthy taste . Nice alert high with mild euphoria. Distractible and day-dreamy”
“it didnt get me high-.-”
